review: This is an excellent purchase if your plans are to stream content.  You can not beat the price.  There is no need to be a smart TV or BlueRay player with Fire TV Stick.  I easily get Prime Video, HBOGo, Netflix, Hulu, etc.  Set up was very easy.  Also can view uploaded pictures to Amazon storage.
author: Kindle Customer

review: All I can say is wow. Very impressive piece of tech. I bought it on vacation at my parents house. My mother has prime but never used the instant video. I was able to teach them how to use prime instant video, netflix, hulu, and crackle. They were stunned and amazed. They quickly bought one for themselves.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I am not aware of this product until recently recommended by friend. Product is very amazing best plugin device for your TV. Only thing I didn't like was the power chord.
